post:
Hi Community,

We're launching our Black Friday/Cyber Monday sale this year!

Save up to **75% off** on hosting services at Stromonic.com starting from now!

**Deals Highlights:**

**Deal #1**: If you’ve been looking to start a new web project, Stromonic has you covered. Get up to **75% off** on all Web Hosting & WordPress Hosting products. Use Coupon Code: **BLACKFRIDAY75**

**Deal #2**: Need something bigger or want to resell hosting to your clients & friends? Get up to **75% off** all Reseller Hosting products. Use Coupon Code: **BLACKFRIDAY75**

**Deal #3**: Are you a power user who needs virtual resources and knows what you want? Get up to **50% off** for VPS Hosting and Cloud Server products. Use Coupon Code: **BLACKFRIDAY50**

**Deal #4**: Do you need the whole dedicated server for mission-critical projects? Get up to **15% off** on all Dedicated Server products. Use Coupon Code: **BLACKFRIDAY15**

**Deal #5**: Domain Name Specials! Did you think we forgot? Register/Transfer your domain with Stromonic, enjoy **10% off** on the below extensions. Use Coupon Code: **BLACKFRIDAY10**

**.com** — only $12.55 — save 10%
**.net** — only $15.25 — save 10%
**.org** — only $14.35 — save 10%
**.biz** — only $20.65 — save 10%
**.info** — only $18.85 — save 10%
**.co** — only $28.75 — save 10%
**.co.uk** — only $8.95 — save 10%

**Act Now:** https://www.stromonic.com

**Don't miss out – this offer ends on Tuesday, November 30, 2021, at 23.59 pm IST.**

Happy Hosting!
